website_summaries.verdict: A classic and budget-friendly powdered creamer that comes in a convenient bulk canister.
pros: One of the most popular non-dairy coffee creamers in a powdered formula
The classic creamer flavor is also a light sweetener
Users love that it dissolves quickly and easily in coffee
It also adds a little thickness to the coffee that replicates dairy creamers
cons: Some users dislike the artificial flavor and ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Comes Nonsealed
customer_reviews.text: This product came with seal not even attached to the container, the lid partially turned and the powder spilling in the inside of the box. I will not be using this as it is completely shady. Anything could be mixed in this powder. I’m very upset that this isn’t eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please don't do me a favor like this again.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered what was posted, which was three 35 ounce containers. I ordered that size because it fits in my kitchen cabinet. What I received was two 56 ounce containers, which are quite tall and don't fit in my kitchen cabinet. Sure, I got a few extra ounces, but the container does not fit in my kitchen cabinet. This is an inconvenience for me and I will never purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Sommers

customer_reviews.title: For my neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Buying anything from Nestles hurts my soul but I buy it for the coffee hours here at our senior housing. Sometimes no matter how hard I try to be environmentally correct, I run up against caring for my neighbors. Left on my own, I would never buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Best quality, non-dairy, powdered creamer ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Because of my allergies to dairy, the ONLY powdered creamer I can purchase is Coffee-mate! I pray they never change the ingredients on this original otherwise I'll have to look for another and I love Nestle products!
customer_reviews.author: Ms67GTO

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for my ☕
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the flavor of this stuff, but had forgotten about it for a while... When I tried to price check for it in my local areas, the price was so much higher than I felt comfortable paying. Amazon saved the day with you and he best price for a coffee creamer that everyone in my family loves! The flavor is light, it mixes so well with my hot coffee (or hot chocolate!) And gives everything a nice creamy flavor and texture without the lactose. Coffee just isn't the same without it, and none of the other brands I have tried can stand up to this one.
customer_reviews.author: SnuggleBunnehh

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper In Bulk Size!
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of creamers and for the powdered type, this is the best and cheaper when bought in bulk like this!
customer_reviews.author: jenash42

customer_reviews.title: Good value and consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: If you like this brand, it's hard to find anything similar that's as good so I meekly pay the higher price locally for the smaller jars. This cannister was a very good price and it's as good as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Bobkitty

customer_reviews.title: Great handles! Hopefully you don’t have small hands
customer_reviews.text: I love the container for this product. Only downside is, the top is so wide that I couldn’t unscrew the darn lid. It took me about two minutes and two hands, wedging the thing against the counter, for me to open it the first time. But if you have bigger hands, or a man, you should be fine with this one. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Smoov and tasty in my Folger
customer_reviews.text: It make your coffee be real smoov and the bottle last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Typhoon Jenkins III

customer_reviews.title: Works well for lactose intolerant.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this and likes it a lot. He's extremely lactose intolerant, so it works well for him. Seems to be consistent from package to package.
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: Original flavor powder
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Coffeemate. It was packaged and shipped well so that it was not damaged. Where I don't drink black coffee but Coffee-Mate powder creamer is good to flavor my coffee. It doesn't leave a horrible after taste in my mouth like some other's will do. Coffeemate non dairy powder creamer is my trusty go to. I keep it in my pantry for when I am out of half and half. But It's not just for when I'm out of half and half. Sometimes I enjoy my coffee without any dairy products.It make my coffee creamy and does not have powdery taste.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: How dare they to advertise this is as non-dairy? It contains caseinate, which is made from milk protein. THIS IS A DAIRY PRODUCT! BE WARNED!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gensbygel

customer_reviews.title: A "must have in pantry" item
customer_reviews.text: Coffee Mate is a staple item in my pantry, like salt & pepper. I always have a canister available for my coffee period. It is tried and true, and a consistently great product in terms of taste. I have used it for decades and cannot imagine changing to another brand of powdered creamer - the various flavors of liquid Coffee Mate in bottles and single serve packs are also great. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't drink my coffee without it!
customer_reviews.text: Been drinking my coffee with this and no other creamer for many years. So, I buy it all the time and am always looking for a good buy. It comes on sale once in awhile, but it is never lower than on here and I get it shipped to my door for free and now have it on auto delivery! Mornings are safe as I put my coffee on auto delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: VickiA

customer_reviews.title: Creamiest on the market...
customer_reviews.text: I've always thought that generics were fine until I ventured to purchase Coffee Mate for the first time. Whereas I was using up to 4 heaping teaspoons of generic versus only 2 of Coffee Mate brand. Worth the extra money in this instance, it's a must buy in this household from now on.
customer_reviews.author: CK Conner

customer_reviews.title: The new name brand is just as good. I probably won't be buying any more of ...
customer_reviews.text: The new name brand is just as good. I probably won't be buying any more of this brand online. Must have been a flute when a bulb is cuz when I'm in the grocery store I always buy the new name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Maryott

customer_reviews.title: Large tub of creamer should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Nice large sized canister is a good bargain providing creamer that will last quite some time. It is rather plain and not particularly sweet though. Useful to have in house since stores at the moment are often out of stock with liquid refrigerated creamer.
customer_reviews.author: vac

customer_reviews.title: Not For Vegans
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this can be called Dairy Free as it contains milk derivatives. Also, although it only has 10 calories per serving, about 45 percent of the calories are from fat. On the plus side, it's totally delicious and it keeps a heck of a lot longer than cream!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Allison`

customer_reviews.title: A staple in my nook
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been skipping the coffee and just eating this by the spoonful the last few years to get my calcium intake, and I can safely say this is the best creamer for the taste and value. It literally melts in your mouth and doesn’t cost a fortune. A staple in my breakfast nook.
customer_reviews.author: C. T.

customer_reviews.title: gotta have for coffee
customer_reviews.text: nothing beats the taste of coffee mate. i have used almost all store brands as well as other national brands. nothing tastes the same. i couldn't rate travel because in my opinion tis is too big to put in a suitcase but maybe some people wouldn't/
customer_reviews.author: valrie consigney

customer_reviews.title: Large container of classic, creamy, rich tasting coffee creamer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great classic, rich, creamy taste. This is a nice large container of a great product. I'm ordering this from now on instead of smaller containers of store brand creamers. I reuse these nice big containers for dry goods storage.
customer_reviews.author: HannaVin

customer_reviews.title: coffee mate
customer_reviews.text: I use coffee mate it is easier to store and use instead of milk and cream. then I use flavoring to make it taste like french vanilla or just vanilla and it makes for and enjoyable cup of coffee in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Coffee-mate Original Canister, 35.3-Ounce
customer_reviews.text: Good flavored creamer at a decent price. Now I have a bountiful supply of decent tasting coffee creamer at the ready. The hand grip built into the jug design is a helpful plus.
customer_reviews.author: JinglepawsTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the only coffee creamer I will use. I won't drink my coffee without it and its been that way for over 20 years. Its the best. Im a daily coffee drinker. The price on here is great because in store its a lot more and never on sale so I stock up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Lots of creamer for the $
customer_reviews.text: Good product and received on time. Also, I inadvertently left a bad delivery review on the seller feedback page with not way to delete it. I wanted to make note of that here in case it helps. Apologies to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Gagner

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely manner given what is going on in the the world. It is a great alternative to half and half when I don't want to venture into stores due to covid-19, I'd say this is a fantastic purchase. My hubby and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Since we are avoiding grocery stores (Covid 19), I decided I better stock up on some essentials and Coffee Mate is one of them. This was a great deal. Dissolves nicely and I love the large opening.
customer_reviews.author: Imamomnwife

customer_reviews.title: Great powdered creanee
customer_reviews.text: I love having this on hand. Coffee creamers are always going bad because of how erratic our use is. This stuff may not be great for you with the hydrogenated oils but it does the job :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Labrada

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good value
customer_reviews.text: I just drink one cup of coffee most days and none some days. Nevertheless I use a lot of coffeemate per cup. Coffee tastes bitter to me without. Still it’s lasting and lasting. Not good for backpacking

customer_reviews.title: Creamer
customer_reviews.text: Really great taste, this price beats the local warehouse type stores price! Large plastic containers so will not break if dropped. When ur done u can use the containers for storage or planters!

customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff especially if you run out of coffee creamer I have this as a back up.

customer_reviews.title: but since those days I like the creamer to tone down the acid a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: used to drink my coffee nothing but black, but since those days I like the creamer to tone down the acid a bit and coffeemate is the only one I have found that actually tastes good
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Coffee Mate is definitely the best creamer! I buy these canisters because of the price and because I can't find this size in my local stores. I can use the containers for other things when I'm done.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you amazon shipping department for all your hard work, you all are the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love folgers coffee and coffee mate, amazon shipping is great!!!

customer_reviews.title: best price except maybe Costco on a good day.
customer_reviews.text: The price per unit on this item is consistently the best. Of course it's a powdered creamer so it's never as good as cream but these taste is ok and the product is cheaper and more convenient than cream.

customer_reviews.title: Really good deal
customer_reviews.text: I've been using powdered cream for years and this was a really good deal I couldn't pass up, I pay over $6 for it at Kroger. That being said the price will probably go up :-(

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, convenient and tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are a cost effective way of refilling a creamer container at my home coffee station. Having sweetener, syrups, creamer and an imagination saves me $5 at the coffee shop on a regular basis.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite powder creamer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shipping nothing damaged

customer_reviews.text: I have used Coffee Mate for many years. Great creamy flavor. Dissolves easily in my coffee. Can be used in soups in place of cream or milk.

customer_reviews.title: You will not get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 3 pack of 35oz coffee mate powdered creamer. I received 2 56oz I have tendon problems in my hands and can not handle the larger containers nor will they fit in the place I store time. They will not refund or replace them. This is not the first time they've done this. I gave them a second chance, much to my physical pain in their not making right by this mistake.

customer_reviews.title: Best dry creamer, bar none.

customer_reviews.title: Purity of of the product & taste

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste but am going to look for something ...

At least it is not high fructose corn syrup. I wish they would quite shrinking the canister size and still charging the same or more...reason for 4 stars.

product_meta.title: COFFEE MATE The Original Powder Coffee Creamer 35.3 Oz. Canister Non-dairy, Lactose Free, Gluten Free Creamer
product_meta.description:
A delicious powdered creamer that delivers the perfect blend of creaminess and sweetness without altering or masking the taste of your coffee.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :5.5 x 5.5 x 6.3 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Date First Available :December 31, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Nestle
 * ASIN :B00MB2WJTU

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars3,957 ratings A delicious powdered creamer that delivers the perfect blend of creaminess and sweetness without altering or masking the taste of your coffee.
feature_bullets: Transforms your coffee into creamy deliciousness
The original rich and deliciously creamy non dairy creamer, perfect anytime you want to enjoy a velvety smooth cup of coffee
Dairy free, lactose free, cholestrol free, non dairy
Each container yields approximately 156 servings (1 tsp per serving)
